# [[bother]], [[trouble]]
#: ''Il aura des '''emmerdements''''' — He'll get in trouble

====Synonyms====
* {{l|fr|emmerde}} (short form, abbreviation)
types.html:
emmerdement m (plural emmerdements)

  1. pain in the ass
    Mais quel emmerdement ! — What a drag !
  2. bother, trouble
    Il aura des emmerdements — He'll get in trouble
    J'ai eu des emmerdements — I ran into some problems

Synonyms

[edit]
  • emmerde (short form, abbreviation)

title: emmerdement
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɑ̃.mɛʁ.də.mɑ̃/, /ɑ̃.mɛʁd.mɑ̃/
